member.name: T:MoleSql.DataContext
member.summary: Represents a data context for the MoleSQL ORM framework.

member.name: P:MoleSql.DataContext.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets a that receives the SQL queries generated by the underlying query provider. Only the overload is used when writing to this , and each "line" is a complete SQL statement. So when providing a custom implementation, only this overload needs to be overwritten to catch all log messages.

member.name: P:MoleSql.DataContext.Connection
member.summary: Gets the underlying of this context.

member.name: P:MoleSql.DataContext.Transaction
member.summary: Gets or sets the transaction to use when interacting with the database.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new for the specified connection.
member.param: A connection string defining the SQL server connection to use.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.#ctor(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection)
member.summary: Creates a new for the given .
member.param: The to use with this context.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.#ctor(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new for the given .
member.param: The to use with this context.
true if the should be owned by this context and disposed when this context is disposed, false if the caller stays responsible for the connection.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of this and the underlying connection if necessary.
member.param: true if called by , false if called from a finalizer.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.GetTable``1
member.summary: Creates a query to the specified table.
member.typeparam: The table to query.
member.returns: An representing a query to the table specified by .

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level and transaction name.
member.returns: An object representing the new transaction.
member.exception: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.BeginTransaction(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level and transaction name.
member.param: The name of the transaction.
member.returns: An object representing the new transaction.
member.exception: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level and transaction name.
member.param: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
member.returns: An object representing the new transaction.
member.exception: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level and transaction name.
member.param: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
The name of the transaction.
member.returns: An object representing the new transaction.
member.exception: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteQuery``1(System.FormattableString)
member.summary: Executes the given query and returns a sequence of results.
member.typeparam: The result type of the queried enumeration.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
member.returns: An enumerator for the query results.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteQueryAsync``1(System.FormattableString,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the given query and returns an asynchronous sequence of results.
member.typeparam: The result type of the queried enumeration.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
The to cancel this asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An asynchronous enumeration of the query results.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteQuery(System.FormattableString)
member.summary: Executes the given query and returns a sequence of dynmic instances.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
member.returns: An enumerator for the query results. Those will be dynamic objects.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteQueryAsync(System.FormattableString,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the given query and returns an asynchronous sequence of dynmic instances.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
The to cancel this asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An asynchronous enumeratorion of the query results. Those will be dynamic objects.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteScalar(System.FormattableString)
member.summary: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: The query to execute.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty. Returns a maximum of 2033 characters.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteScalar``1(System.FormattableString)
member.summary: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: The query to execute.
member.typeparam: The type to cast the result to.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set as .

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.FormattableString,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the query asynchronously, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: The query to execute.
The to cancel this asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty. Returns a maximum of 2033 characters.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteScalarAsync``1(System.FormattableString,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the query asynchronously, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: The query to execute.
The to cancel this asynchronous operation.
member.typeparam: The type to cast the result to.
member.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set as .

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteNonQuery(System.FormattableString)
member.summary: Executes the given query or command and returns the number of affected rows.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
member.returns: The number of affected rows.

member.name: M:MoleSql.DataContext.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.FormattableString,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the given query or command asynchronoulsy and returns a task that on completion returns the number of affected rows.
member.param: The sql command to execute. Format parameters will be turned into query parameters.
The to cancel this asynchronous operation.
member.returns: The number of affected rows.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Expressions.DbExpressionType
member.summary: Extends the original with new sql expression types to create SQL/CLR-hybrid expression trees.

member.name: M:MoleSql.Expressions.ExpressionExtensions.StripQuotes(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Removes the quote expressions around lambda expressions.
member.param: The expression to remove outer quotes from.
member.returns: The "naked" lambda expression without outer quotes.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Extensions.MoleSqlQueryable
member.summary: Provides special operators IQueryables based on instances.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Helpers.ProjectionRow
member.summary:
This base class is used to bind columns. It is used as a constant expression in the projection lambda expression to read columns by their ordinal (the index parameter of the method) from the .
It also declares a method that exeuctes sub queries () in selectors. The lambda expressions will be created by the and the reading will be done in the .

member.name: T:MoleSql.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurck, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: berschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads fr alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_AggregateTypeNotSupported
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The aggregate type '{0}' is not supported. hnelt.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_BinaryExpressionCannotBeAppliedToNullValues

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_CanOnlyBeIteratedOnce
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die A result set can only be iterated once (in '{0}'). hnelt.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_DoesNotSupportDifferentQueryProvider

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_ExpressionIsNotASequence

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_JoinTypeIsNotSupported
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die The join type '{0}' is not supported. hnelt.

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_MethodCanOnlyAppearOnTopOfExpressionTree

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_MethodNotSupported

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_NodeTypeIsInvalid

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_NullCannotBeCastToType

member.name: P:MoleSql.Properties.Resources.Exception_NullValuesOnLeftSideNotSupported

member.name: T:MoleSql.Query`1
member.summary: The root element for MoleSql queries.
member.typeparam: The type of the table.

member.name: P:MoleSql.QueryProvider.Log
member.summary: When writing to this , please only use the overload. That's what is promised to clients so it's easier to implement a class deriving from to use with this provider.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Translators.LocalEvaluator
member.summary: This class visits an expression and will evaluate all parts of it that already can be evaluated. That is, all parts that don't refer to an parameter expression (hence requiring the database to be queried first).

member.name: M:MoleSql.Translators.LocalEvaluator.EvaluateLocally(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Boolean})
member.summary:
Traverses the given and evaluates all parts of it that can be evaluated locally without querying the database. That means that all constant expressions, local method calls, calculations etc. are evaluated and represented in the final expression tree as primitive constants.
This needs to be done before translating the expression tree into SQL.
member.param: The to evaluate.
A function to determine if an expression can be evaluated locally.
member.returns: The resulting that no longer contains anything else but parameter or primitive constant expressions.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Translators.SqlFormattableString
member.summary: Provides the extension method to create parameterized SQL queries () from formattable strings ().

member.name: T:MoleSql.Translators.SqlFormattableString.FormatCapturingParameter
member.summary: Holds a sql format parameter.
member.remarks: The format parameter is converted into an with the corresponding parameter name ('@pXX'). The second parameter of the constructor is used to count the parameters. If the argument is an (but not ), multiple SqlParameters are created and later formated with braces ("(@p0, @p1...)").

member.name: T:MoleSql.Translators.SqlQueryTranslator
member.summary: Provides a static entry point () to translate expression trees into sql queries.

member.name: M:MoleSql.Translators.SqlQueryTranslator.Translate(MoleSql.QueryProvider,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Translates the given into an SQL query.
member.param: The that executes this query. This is necessary to determine locally evaluatable expression subtrees.
The expression tree to translate.
member.returns: A holding the information required to build a to execute the query.

member.name: T:MoleSql.Translators.TranslationResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a complete translation of an expreesion tree into an SQL query. Includes the sql query text (), a lambda expression to project the results into objects ( and a list of parameters for the sql query ().
